definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Q-Tip and RZA join up to create a masterpiece.
sentences.chinese: 棉条和RZA联合起来创建一个杰作。

sentences.english: Double apron web take-off device allowing visual inspection of the web ensures sliver delivering constantly at high speed.
sentences.chinese: 可视棉网的双皮圈导棉装置，保证棉条高速稳定输出。

sentences.english: So what is the relationship between tampons and crampons?
sentences.chinese: 至于棉条和冰爪究竟有什么关系呢？

sentences.english: Increase the pressing roller pressure to shrink cotton, reducing channel blocking.
sentences.chinese: 加大压辊压力来收缩棉条，减少通道堵塞。

sentences.english: One quick test neps method for raw cotton and cotton sliver was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨一种快速测试原棉和棉条中棉结的方法。

sentences.english: At the doffer, fibers are removed and eventually enter the card sliver .
sentences.chinese: 纤维被从落纱机上剥下，形成梳棉棉条输出。

sentences.english: Do not use douches or tampons.
sentences.chinese: 不要灌洗或用月经棉条。

sentences.english: Some women worry about their personal exposure to dioxins through tampons.
sentences.chinese: 一些女士担心会因为棉条接触到二恶英。

sentences.english: Black spot indicates successive movement of sliver trough a combing cycle.
sentences.chinese: 黑点表明棉条在一个精梳周期上的连续运动。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduces the processing device and technology of sliver mercerization .
sentences.chinese: 介绍了对棉条进行丝光加工的装置和加工工艺。

sentences.english: Let her choose whether she prefers a pad or a tampon.
sentences.chinese: 让她选择，看她是喜欢使用护垫还是棉条。

sentences.english: Slivers are fed through the lapper that smooths them to a thin layer of fibers which is wound onto a roll.
sentences.chinese: 送入成卷机的棉条被拉伸成薄层并卷绕在筒管上。

definition: sterilized absorbent cotton wool (used for dressings or cleansing wounds)/sanitary napkin/tampon
